resources.string: Please Grant Permissions to run this App smoothly!
Without permissions, this app won\'t work properly.\nPlease grant permissions in app Settings

\

Developer : Jeet Inc.

Version : 2.0.1

Urgent Notice :

Due to recent security changes in Android 9, the permission to read call logs is not granted. So, this app can\'t read the incoming phone numbers. We are continuously trying to fix this problem. Until then, for all devices running Android 9 and above, this app WILL NOT SHOW the phone numbers, and only sequence number 1,2,3... will be shown.

Overview

Missed Call Duration is an AD FREE app and will forever remain AD FREE.

It shows you the duration of your missed calls.

Do you ever wonder about how long your phone was ringing when you missed a call? Or does someone call you only for a few seconds and then hang up? Then this app might be useful to you.

Now you can know who gave you only a missed call OR a long ring duration could mean an urgent call you missed.

When you get a missed call, this app will keep track of the time and duration and will optionally notify you.

Thanks for downloading this app. If you like it, rate it on the play store and share it with your friends!

Features

Direct Calling

Notifications

Variable Log Length

Share app with friends
